p: The dysautonomia postural tachycardia syndrome (POTS) can be a consequence of viral illnesses [ 56, 157] and may have an autoimmune component [ 78, 108, 154]. There are substantial concerns—but no published data—about possibly increased risk from COVID-19 in people with POTS. Conversely, one may anticipate an increased incidence of POTS in COVID-19 patients.
